definition: Wang Liqin (1978-), former PRC table tennis player, Olympic medalist
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

sentences.english: And China's Wang Liqin defeated Sweden's Jorgen Persson for bronze.
sentences.chinese: 而中國的王勵勤擊敗瑞典的佩爾森獲得銅牌。

sentences.english: Malin defeated his compatriot Wang Liqin in the quarter final.
sentences.chinese: 在四分之一決賽中，馬琳擊敗了他的同胞王勵勤。

sentences.english: Wang Liqin is very unsatisfied to his performance.
sentences.chinese: 王勵勤對自己的表現很不滿意。
